name: Jarang

skills.name: Armor Piercer
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 30% of the target's DEF.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Stunning Toss
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Talons
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff and a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
